00011 void LocalVariableListener::VariableChanged( VariableAttribut * ChangedVariable )
00012 {
00013         if ( GetUserData() == NULL )
00014         {
00015                 // Bad call, do nothing...
00016                 return;
00017         }
00018

00020         Service * CurrentService = static_cast<Service*>(UserData);
00021

00025 bool LocalVariableListener::IsValid( VariableAttribut * ChangedVariable, SimpleString NewValue )
00026 {
00027         if ( GetUserData() == NULL )
00028         {
00029                 // Bad call, do nothing so say the variable can change...
00030                 return true;
00031         }
00032 
00033         // Do my job
00034         Service * CurrentService = static_cast<Service*>(UserData);
00035 
00036         return IsValid(*CurrentService, ChangedVariable->GetName(), NewValue);
